spec_data.Name: python2-virtualenv
spec_data.Description:
virtualenv is a tool to create isolated Python environments. virtualenv
is a successor to workingenv, and an extension of virtual-python. It is
written by Ian Bicking, and sponsored by the Open Planning Project. It is
licensed under an MIT-style permissive license
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 05:08:20 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Tool to create isolated Python environments
